Step 1: Ensure required libraries are loaded in your Webflow project

The bundle requires the following libraries to be available globally:

GSAP (with ScrollTrigger, Observer, Draggable plugins)
SplitText (or split-type alternative)
Lenis (smooth scroll)
D3.js (for chart visualizations)
imagesLoaded

Step 2: Add the animation bundle

Load the bundle after all dependencies in Project Settings ‚Üí Custom Code ‚Üí Footer Code
